provider.name: Jina AI
provider.description: Multimodal multilingual long-context embeddings for search, RAG, agents applications.

models.title: Embed

models.note: Rerank is supported through the Post Proxy call. Read more [here](/../link/to/post-proxy-dcoumentation)

notSupported.promptPlayground: Prompt playground is not supported for Jina AI models

integrationViaVirtualKey.description: Integrate Jina AI using Portkey's virtual key system

inline.text: Get your API key from Jina AI and add it to Portkey to create a virtual key.
inline.description: You can get your Jina AI API key from the Jina AI website [here](https://jina.ai/).

portkeyPythonSDK.description: Initialize Portkey with the virtual key in Python
portkeyPythonSDK.codeExample: sample python SDK code for embed Jina AI using jina-embeddings-v2-base-es
